title: VDA Productions Invests in MarketingProfs' Ninth Annual B2B
text:
BOSTON , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --  VDA Productions , the premier provider of 3D marketing experiences and design solutions that bring brands to life for Corporate Meetings , Tradeshows , Themed Events , Exhibits and Themed Retail Environments , and Corporate Facilities , today announces that it will be sponsoring MarketingProfs' Ninth Annual B2B Marketing Forum . Meghan Welborn , Senior Director of Marketing at VDA Productions will be introducing keynote Sherry Turkle , the Abby Rockefeller Mauze Professor of the Social Studies of Science and Technology at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology . Turkle, a TED Talk veteran has appeared on Nightline ,  Fresh Air ,  Frontline ,  20/20 , and  The Colbert Report . A decorated professor, Turkle has been named a Harvard Centennial Medalist and a Ms. Magazine Woman of the Year; in 2014 she was elected a Fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences. Turkle most recently served as a panelist at the Fenway Forum , a discussion on the meaning of citizenship, hosted by Harvard's Michael Sandel as a part of HUBweek 2015 ( October 3-10 ).
Turkle, author of "Reclaiming Conversation: The Power of Talk in a Digital Age"is the leading researcher on the impacts of the digital revolution, and how it has changed "how we think, feel, and relate to ourselves and each other" ( Forbes ). "Turkle's message stresses the importance of face-to-face, human engagement in the technological age," said Welborn. "Reclaiming conversation" is an objective we share at VDA â€“ designing event experiences and environments that foster engagement and... Conversation! Let's thrive together!"
VDA will be represented by Meghan Welborn , Senior Director of Marketing, and Sales Account Executives Jennifer Crawford Ashburn and Gillian Rulewski .
MarketingProfs' B2B Marketing Forum is a meeting where "the leaders, the innovators, the people who make things happen gather to learn about the latest in B2B marketing and share the secrets to their success." 
For more information on the event please visit http://mpb2b.marketingprofs.com/ , follow MarketingProfs on Twitter @MarketingProfs, and search #mpb2b. 
About VDA Productions 
VDA Productions brings visions and brands to life for Corporate Meetings, Tradeshows, Themed Events, Exhibits, Themed Retail Environments, and Corporate Facilities.  The company has produced events on a national and global scale, and employs a full-time team of experienced professionals including executive staff, creative designers, account executives, producers and production managers, carpenters, welders, sculptors, painters, lighting directors and audio engineers. VDA provides clientele with virtually turnkey event management solutions integrating all logistical, production, fulfillment and management aspects, with the majority of production needs being met fully in-house.
For more information, please visit  www.VDAProductions.com , follow us on Twitter @VDAProductions, or visit our Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/VDAProductions .
